book.synopsis: Enhanced with illustrations throughout, including original storyboard art, the screenplay for the first Star Wars motion picture features highlights from a 1977 interview with George Lucas in Rolling Stone. Original. Movie tie-in.
book.title_long: A New Hope: The Illustrated Screenplay (Star Wars, Episode IV)
book.dimensions: Height: 8.25 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.25 Inches
